title: I Hate None Of You, Except For Rasen and Viri, These Ones Suck

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack someone each night. This attack is Powerful is they have a role number greater than 1000, and Unstoppable if they have a role number greater than 1995.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You win with everybody except for Rasen and Viri specifically and they can win with you, no matter what their role is.
- You have a permanent private chat with everyone except for Rasen and Viri
- You also win with and have a permanent private chat with yourself.
- Nobody must be in the game for this role to roll, but everybody can roll this role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you
